original_text: Because you have done this, I will bless you. I will make your descendants become so many that people cannot count them. They will be as many as the stars that are in the sky. They will be as many as the pieces of sand on the shore by the sea. Your descendants will win against their enemies and their enemies' cities.
korean_text: 내가 네게 큰 복을 주고 네 씨가 크게 번성하여 하늘의 별과 같고 바닷가의 모래와 같게 하리니 네 씨가 그 대적의 성문을 차지하리라

sentences.original_text: I will make your descendants become so many
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 자손을 매우 많게 만들리라
사람들이 그들을 셀 수 없게 되리라

sentences.original_text: They will be as many as the stars
They will be as many as the pieces of sand
on the shore by the sea
Your descendants will win against their enemies
